--- schema
type StructAsMapWithDefault struct {
  foo Int
  bar Bool
  baz String
} representation map {
  field foo default "0"
  field bar default "false"
}
--- expected
{
  "StructAsMapWithDefault": {
    "kind": "struct",
    "fields": {
      "foo": {
        "type": "Int"
      },
      "bar": {
        "type": "Bool"
      },
      "baz": {
        "type": "String"
      }
    },
    "representation": {
      "map": {
        "fields": {
          "foo": { "default": 0 },
          "bar": { "default": false }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
---
